title: In California, Democrats Square Off in Fierce 2022 Warfare
description: The liberal state, where Democrats often run against fellow Democrats in November thanks to an unconventional election system, is the unlikely backdrop of some of this yearâ€™s most bitter political campaigns.
dc:creator: Ken Bensinger
media:credit: Alisha Jucevic for The New York Times
media:description: David Kim, center, a Democratic candidate for the U.S. House in California, has faced attacks from his Democratic opponent, who has accused him of being a right-wing extremist.
